headline: Lockheed Martin Corporation (LMT)’s First Next-Gen GEO-Based Missile Warning Satellite Completes Environmental Testing
summary: Lockheed Martin Corporation (NYSE:LMT) is among the 11 Best Large Cap Defense Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On August 6, the company announced that its first Next-Generation Overhead Persistent Infrared (Next-Gen OPIR) Geosynchronous Earth Orbit (GEO) Block 0 satellite had completed environmental testing. The new missile warning satellite, which is more capable and survivable, […]
